subject: Fwd: Thank you, we accepted your refinance loan request
body:
Your your credit report doesn't matter to us!
 
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you NOW (hurry, this deal will expire THIS EVENING):
 
$323,000+ loan
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
 
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this quick form... 
 
Do not worry about approval, your your credit report will not disqualify you!
 
http://tslhqjectrum.com/
